sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Upper Mississippi Land Acquisition Act.

sections.heading: Consent of the State of Illinois is given to the acquisition
sections.text:
by the United States by purchase, gift or lease of such areas, of land
or water, or of land and water in Illinois as the United States may deem
necessary for the establishment of the Upper Mississippi River Wild Life
and Fish Refuge in accordance with the Act of Congress approved June 7,
1924. The State of Illinois retains concurrent jurisdiction with the
United States over such areas in the matter of the service thereon of
all civil and criminal process issuing under the authority of the State
of Illinois and in the matter of salvaging fish taken from such
overflowed areas.
